content: hello
my name is bud parr and i run an agency called the new dynamic
as well as a community for jam stack enthusiasts also called the new dynamic
long ago at my agency we picked hugo as our tool of choice for a few simple
reasons for the work we do we needed a tool that
would give us stability speed and ease of use across a wide variety of
cases in short hugo works from simple sites to
enterprise scale we increasingly get called upon to build
large multi-faceted projects and because hugo is a binary application
we never have to worry about our sites breaking in the years to come
we really value that stability when most people learn about hugo
they hear about its super fast build times which remains an incredible
advantage particularly as your sites grow in size
and complexity we can't ask our users to wait around
for their site to go live so we chose a tool that doesn't make
them what's amazing is the hugo just keeps getting faster an
upcoming release will unleash hugo for even the largest sites
with even faster builds at scale and recently
bjorn eric hugo's lead developer solved one of our biggest workflow issues in
bringing our asset pipeline into hugo's build process
that includes es6 bundling and post css or sas builds
no more waiting for webpack to do its thing on top of that
hugo has a host of image processing capabilities so we're not reliant on
third parties to optimize our site at all last year we started using hugo
modules this new feature has allowed us to pull
in components from any repository to use in our sites
this is like having your own npm but really fast and without the headaches
it's been a game changer for us hugo modules has allowed us to create
distribute and reuse our own modules looking down the line there's been work
and progress for hugo to build pages from external data sources
while this is possible today with tools that stackbit or others have built
when that becomes native to hugo it will be an unbeatable tool pushing jamstack
further so if you haven't considered using hugo
in your work there's never been a better time to do so
thank you you
